body: Most of you won't get this. Windows computers allow you to have internet without WiFi. I accidentally hit forget on the internet thing that requires no router. What should I do?
body_tagged: Most of you won't get this. Windows computers allow you to have internet without WiFi. I accidentally hit forget on the internet thing that requires no router. What should I do?
title: Help Internet

replies.body: Try restarting your PC if you haven't already, and reconnecting to the WiFi. If that doesn't work, try looking at the Windows support page. Hope this helped. ;)
replies.body_tagged: Try restarting your PC if you haven't already, and reconnecting to the WiFi. If that doesn't work, try looking at the Windows support page. Hope this helped. ;)

replies.body:
Are you talking about Broadband?

You have to redo the whole setup again I think. Google how to connect to broadband or something like that.
